title: New: Avaberée – Running Out
body:
Hey, guess where **Avaberée** are from? Yep, you guessed it, Australia.

This trio of perfect pop princesses (Aimee Cavanagh, Genevieve Bufalino and Irena Lysiuk) are set to take blogs by storm with their recent single _Running Out_. So it’s definitely right in line with the current ‘in’ sound; slightly delirious, sugary synth pop, but don’t let that distract you from what is a fantastically crafted pop song. Listen to _Running Out_ below.
